body.content:
My Dear,

I thank you for your reply, May God bless you for your email which
frankly is coming at the right time. I have received your details and
all information well noted. Thank you very much for your reply and for
your willingness to receive the fund in your bank account. As you
could understand my critical health condition now, i am seriously
bed-ridden and i barely struggle to write from my sick bed. To help me
and to make things easier for me, i have forward you the contact
details of the bank manager in Burkina Faso, so that you will start
direct communications with him regarding this fund because he is in
good position to guide you better on how you will  apply as the
beneficiary of this fund. Already, i have sent him a mail that my
business partner (being you) will contact him soonest for the transfer
of this money. I am at medical tourism Centre hospital Australie .

I am in Australie taking my medication am not been allow to operate on
phone or answer phone calls because of my health condition am only
allowed to make use of my laptop to read news. I understood your mail
clearly, i want you to understand that i have sincere trust in you so
i don't need any second or third party in this claims the company
manager will help you direct you on how this fund will be remitted to
you into account without you having any problem. I am very confident
that with your support, we can help the less privilege, the needy, the
widows, the destitute, the poor and the orphans, we really need to
give them peace and hope, you can contact him immediately with the
contact details seen below:

Name:    Miss.Miriam Michel

Email:  missmiriammichel10@hotmail.com

Please contact him immediately with the above details, and also send
him your personal phone number such that he can also contact you
urgently if need be. Thank you and May the Good God bless you
abundantly.

From Doctor Lilia Roko.
